result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Ronell Hibbler in court with attorney Lori Ann Kuehn.  Defendant Ronell Hibbler in custody.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.
The State is DRI 15CF148, DRI 14CF355 and in 14CF772, deft will plead to Cts 1 & 2. Balance are DRI. State recommends, on Ct 1-8 yrs WPS bifurcated as 5 yrs IC, 3 yrs ES consec to time deft is currently serving. On Ct 2, 3 yrs WPS bifurcated as 18 yrs IC, 18 yrs ES,  conc with Ct 1
P-G to both counts
COP filed, rights given
the deft waives right to JT
the State relies on comp for FB - defense stipulates to same
finding of guilt

BTC: guilty as above. PSI ordered
To transport defendant from DCI for a Plea Hearing on 03/21/16 @ 1500.
Plea hearing at 03-21-2016 03:00 pm

Attorney Lori Ann Kuehn in court.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.
Defendant was not produced. The State didn't know in enough time that deft was transferred to Dodge  Plea hearing scheduled for March 21, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Ronell Hibbler in court with attorney Robert William Peterson.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond previously signed/set to continue.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 9, 2014 at 08:30 am.
ZCI
Adjourned initial appearance on March 26, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Ronell Hibbler in court.  Robert S. Repischak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.
BTC: Adj for deft to obtain counsel. Bond set.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 26, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
